title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When attempting to right click on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a menu should pop up allowing users to add breakpoints and marks. However, in Photon, this menu does not appear.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. This should trigger a popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, it does not.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. A popup menu should appear allowing users to add breakpoints/marks, but it is currently not functioning in Photon.
